DOC.criteria: 1 . Men 2 . Ages 18 40 year . 3 . Body mass index less equal 30 kg/m2 1 . History clinical sign heart , lung , kidney , endocrine organ disease . 2 . Abnormal biochemical screening blood regarding : Bhemoglobin , Psodium , Ppotassium , Pcreatinine , Palbumin , Pbilirubin , Palanine aminotransferase , Palkaline phosphatase , Pcholesterol , Bglucose . 3 . Abnormal screen urine regarding : albumin glucose 4 . Malignant disease . 5 . Known arterial hypertension measure 24 hour blood pressure 135 mmHg systolic 85 mmHg diastolic . 6 . Alcohol abuse . 7 . Smoking . 8 . Drug use abuse . 9 . Known intolerance allergy dihydralazine 10 . Blood donation within 1 month start study .
